results.title: Metformin ameliorates liver fibrosis induced by congestive hepatopathy via the mTOR/HIF-1alpha signaling pathway.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ ameliorates @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver fibrosis@@@ induced by @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@congestive hepatopathy@@@ via the @GENE_MTOR @GENE_56717 @@@mTOR@@@/@GENE_HIF1A @GENE_15251 @@@HIF-1alpha@@@ signaling pathway.

citations.NLM: Yang J, Li S, Liu S, Zhang Y, Shen D, Wang P, Dang X. Metformin ameliorates liver fibrosis induced by congestive hepatopathy via the mTOR/HIF-1alpha signaling pathway. Ann Hepatol. 2023 Jul 12;():101135. PMID: 37451514

results.title: Metformin Prevents Low-dose Isoproterenol-induced Cardiac Dilatation and Systolic Dysfunction in Male Sprague Dawley Rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Prevents Low-dose @CHEMICAL_Isoproterenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007545 @@@Isoproterenol@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@Cardiac Dilatation@@@ and @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@Systolic Dysfunction@@@ in Male Sprague Dawley @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Peterson VR, Norton GR, Madziva MT, Makaula S. Metformin Prevents Low-dose Isoproterenol-induced Cardiac Dilatation and Systolic Dysfunction in Male Sprague Dawley Rats. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2022 Mar 1;79(3):289-295. PMID: 34775423

results.title: Doxorubicin downregulates autophagy to promote apoptosis-induced dilated cardiomyopathy via regulating the AMPK/mTOR pathway.
results.text_hl: In addition, @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@ reduced oxidative stress, prevented @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial damage@@@, and restored energy metabolic homeostasis in @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@DOX@@@-treated cardiomyocytes. In vivo, we used @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@) which is an @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activator to protect cardiac tissue to alleviate @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@DOX@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang S, Wei X, Zhang H, Wu Y, Jing J, Huang R, Zhou T, Hu J, Wu Y, Li Y, You Z. Doxorubicin downregulates autophagy to promote apoptosis-induced dilated cardiomyopathy via regulating the AMPK/mTOR pathway. Biomed Pharmacother. 2023 Jun;162():114691. PMID: 37060659

results.title: Patient-derived microphysiological model identifies the therapeutic potential of metformin for thoracic aortic aneurysm
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mouse@@@ @DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Thoracic @DISEASE_MESH:D017545 @@@TAA@@@ model and @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ clinical data validate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may maintain contractile phenotype and delay @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@aortic dilation@@@.

citations.NLM: Ma W, Zhang J, Liu S, Yan S, Xu K, Zhang YS, Abudupataer M, Ming Y, Zhu S, Xiang B, Zhou X, Luo S, Huang H, Tang Y, Zhang S, Xie Z, Chen N, Sun X, Li J, Lai H, Wang C, Zhu K, Zhang W. results.title: Metformin Enhances Autophagy and Provides Cardioprotection in delta-Sarcoglycan Deficiency-Induced Dilated Cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Enhances Autophagy and Provides Cardioprotection in delta-Sarcoglycan Deficiency-Induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@Dilated Cardiomyopathy@@@.

results.title: Effect of insulin therapy on endothelium-dependent dilation in type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@Endothelial dysfunction@@@ is an early marker of @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@ occurring in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@. @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@Endothelium-dependent dilation@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@EDD@@@) has been shown to improve by combined therapy of @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Gaenzer H, Neumayr G, Marschang P, Sturm W, Lechleitner M, Föger B, Kirchmair R, Patsch J. Effect of insulin therapy on endothelium-dependent dilation in type 2 diabetes mellitus. Am J Cardiol. 2002 Feb 15;89(4):431-4. PMID: 11835925

results.title: Metformin causes nitric oxide-mediated dilatation in a shorter time than insulin in the iliac artery of the anesthetized pig.
results.text_hl: We tested the hypothesis that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ produces @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@arterial dilatation@@@ indirectly, by directly exposing the endothelial surface, of an occluded test segment of the @SPECIES_9823 @@@pig@@@ iliac artery in vivo, to test blood containing @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or excess @GENE_INS @GENE_397415 @@@insulin@@@, with and without the presence of the @GENE_NOS2 @GENE_396859 @@@nitric oxide (NO) synthase@@@ inhibitor NG-nitro-L-arginine methyl ester hydrochloride.

citations.NLM: O'Hora TR, Markos F, Wiernsperger NF, Noble MI. Metformin causes nitric oxide-mediated dilatation in a shorter time than insulin in the iliac artery of the anesthetized pig. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2012 Feb;59(2):182-7. PMID: 22048751
citations.BibTeX: @article{22048751, title={Metformin causes nitric oxide-mediated dilatation in a shorter time than insulin in the iliac artery of the anesthetized pig.}, author={O'Hora TR and Markos F and Wiernsperger NF and Noble MI}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={59}, number={2}, pages={182-7}}
